Sequence Information.Peptide Name: DAN1 (likely natural AMPs; cecropin-like, UCLL1, insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (86.49%) tocecropin AMol formula: C184H316N53O47; Mol Wt: 4034.831; Mol Ex Coeff: 5550; GRAVY:  -0.159.Activity:  active against E. coli (MIC 4.9 ug/ml), S.aureus (MIC>200 ug/ml), B.subtilis (MIC 131.3 uM), C.albicans (MIC >200 ug/ml), P. aeruginosa (MIC 7 ug/ml), and K. pneumoniae (MIC 16.2 ug/ml).Toxicity:  non-hemo.lytic till 200 ug/ml.
Literature Information.Author: Duwadi D, Shrestha A, Yilma B, Kozlovski I, Sa-Eed M, Dahal N, Jukosky J
Literature Information.Title: Identification and screening of potent antimicrobial peptides in arthropod genomes.
